trans-unit.source: The condition (expression quoted) that must evaluate to true.

target.mrk: The condition (expression quoted) that must evaluate to true.

trans-unit.source: [optional] If true, the script is aborted.

seg-source.mrk: If true, the script is aborted.

target.mrk: If true, the script is aborted.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The exit code to use if the script is aborted.

target.mrk: The exit code to use if the script is aborted.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Displays the line number where the assertion failed. If this value is not changed, then the default value will show the correct line.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of the condition (Only valid when not exiting).

trans-unit.source: @error and @extended are not destroyed on return.
